data.question: Which of the following is not an international organisation?
Which of the following disorders is the fear of being alone?
What is the speed of sound?
What was the first country to use tanks in combat during World War I?
Where did the powers of Spiderman come from?
choices: He was bitten by a radioactive spider
He went through a scientific experiment
He woke up with them after a dream
data.answer: He was bitten by a radioactive spider

data.question: In the series “Game of Thrones”, Winterfell is the ancestral home of which family?
Which company is known for publishing the Mario video game?
Which was the first film by Disney to be produced in colour?
choices: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
data.answer: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
